channel.title: Red Frontier
channel.description: Commander Taylor Fullerton knows what it takes to survive. Three years ago, she lost her crew in a mysterious epidemic and has carried on their one-way mission to colonize Mars in complete isolation. When another crew lands on the Red planet, she must discover the truth to avoid repeating their fate while struggling to maintain her sanity.Written and directed by Sarah Nolen. Starring Betty Gilpin, Charlie Barnett, Maria Dizzia, Ashley Park, Finn Wittrock, and Kara Young. Score by Ghostly Kisses. Special thanks to NASA.New episodes every Monday.

item.title: Sol Eleven: Resilience
item.description: Taylor’s fate is sealed.Red Frontier, written and directed by Sarah Nolen. Starring Betty Gilpin, Charlie Barnett, Maria Dizzia, Ashley Park, Finn Wittrock, and Kara Young.  Executive producer Mimi O’Donnell. Senior producer Katie Pastore. Associate producer Julie Balefsky. Recording and engineering by Armando Serrano. Sound design by Armando Serrano and Daniel Brunelle. Mix by Daniel Brunelle. Additional engineering by Jonathon Roberts and Steven Tejeda. Score by Ghostly Kisses. Music supervision by Liz Fulton. Red Frontier is a Spotify original podcast and a Gimlet production.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Sol Ten: Murderer on Mars
item.description: What happens on Mars, doesn’t stay on Mars.Red Frontier, written and directed by Sarah Nolen. Red Frontier is a Spotify original podcast and a Gimlet production.   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Welcome to the Red Frontier
item.description: Commander Taylor Fullerton (Betty Gilpin) knows what it takes to survive. Three years ago, she lost her crew in a mysterious epidemic and has carried on their one-way mission to colonize Mars in complete isolation. When another crew lands on the Red planet, she must discover the truth to avoid repeating their fate while struggling to maintain her sanity. Premieres June 14. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
